verses.name: Joshua 13:27
verses.text: And in the valley, Beth–aram, and Beth–nimrah, and Succoth, and Zaphon, the rest of the kingdom of Sihon king of Heshbon, Jordan and his border, even unto the edge of the sea of Chinnereth on the other side Jordan eastward.

verses.name: Joshua 13:28
verses.text: This is the inheritance of the children of Gad after their families, the cities, and their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 13:29
verses.text: And Moses gave inheritance unto the half tribe of Manasseh: and this was the possession of the half tribe of the children of Manasseh by their families.
